contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 24, 1971 D Skelmersdale Contest (Section B)
Skelmersdale Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest-section-b
Brookfield School, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK
Best cornet - Pemberton. Best horn - Dobcross. Best euphonium - Llanrug. Best trombone - Christ Church. Prizes - 1st £20 and rose bowl, 2nd £12 and cup, 3rd £8 and cup. 9 bands competed. 4th annual contest.
April 24, 2013, 11:07 a.m. June 18, 2016, 10:26 p.m.
1 Trinity Girls Band Granville Jennings Carnival [Perkin]
2 Llanrug Band E. Needham King Lear
3 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band George Roby Indian Summer
4 Dobcross Silver Band G. Holt From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Prescot Cables George Lawrenson The Seasons [Carr]
Unknown Result Bolton (Hoover) Band E. Foulkes Coriolanus
Unknown Result Hindley Granville Jennings English Folk Song Suite
Unknown Result Latchford Fred Ingham The Seasons [Carr]
Unknown Result Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood Coriolanus
